Html:
Are there plans to enable TypeScript in Visual Studio 2012 Express for Windows 8?

I have 3 of the Express versions of Visual Studio 2012 installed:

    Web
    Windows Desktop
    Windows 8

I've been using TypeScript in the Web version of Express and loving it. I'd like to try a Javascript Windows 8 app using TypeScript. It seems to me that enabling this in the free product would encourage folks with a mostly web background to test the waters with app development.
Glad you're loving TS in the Web version.  Currently, the Web version is what we're focused on supporting of the Express products.
